attributes.title: King&#39;s Landing urchin
attributes.actor: Stephen GrechA '''King&#39;s Landing urchin''' is an unnamed minor character in the Season 1
attributes.9: yes==References==ReflistCategory:CharactersCategory:Minor CharactersCategory:Status: AliveCategory:Quote neededCategory:Unnamed CharactersCategory:SmallfolkCategory:Characters from the Crownlands

sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
While [[Arya Stark]] is in [[Flea Bottom]], she hears a commotion and sees people starting to run past. She calls to a small ragged child and asks him where the crowds are going. As he is running past her, he tells her that [[City Watch|they]] are taking "[[Eddard Stark|him]]" to the [[Great Sept of Baelor]]. When she asks who, he looks back over his shoulder and says, "The [[Hand of the King]]".<ref>"[[Baelor]]"</ref>
